S.TRANSL: 大家好。今天老師要教大家食物的阿美語怎麼說。
Hello everyone. Today, I am going to teach you how to say the Ami language for food.

S.FORM: Mafana'ay a mitengil to sowal no singsi haw?
Mafana'ay a mitengil to sowal no singsi haw?

awaay matengil ako, ngaayay taangayen ko ngiha haw?

hadaken ko impic.

hadaken ko sasipasip.

caliwen ho ko sasipasip no kapot.

o imeng cingra.

o Yencoming ko wina iso haw?

akawang ko wama iso haw?

mafana'ay a somowal to caciyaw no 'Amis ko safa iso haw?

S.TRANSL: Yes, they speak the ethnic language.

S.FORM: papina ko salikaka no miso?
papina ko salikaka no miso?

tatolo ko salikaka no mako.

Yes, I live with my mom and dad.

cowa, cowa ka malacafay a maro' i loma' cangraan.

cowa ka faedet, cowa kasi^enaw, saemelay.

awaay ko olol no kakarayan, masadakay to ko fois.

S.FORM: masamaanay ko romi'ad i papotal?

taangay ko fali itini.

S.FORM: mitilid to kako.
mitilid to kako.

si^naway ko romi'ad, taedipen a ci riko'.

masadak to kako.

Caka piasik kiso?

Aka ho, cowa ho malaheci a miasik itini.

Kaesoay ko losay a kaenen haw?

S.FORM: kati'ihay kaemeaday to koni.
kati'ihay kaemeaday to koni.

No, this is already very cheap.

S.FORM: Alaen ako kona odax.
Alaen ako kona odax.

Tolo polo' a limood kona odax, o manan ho ko aalaen iso?
S.TRANSL: 這餅乾30元，你還需要別的東西嗎?
$30 for the cookies, anything else you need?

S.FORM: Ngaayay kako micaliw kisonan to payci han?
Ngaayay kako micaliw kisonan to payci han?

S.FORM: Ngaayay to , hakowa ko cacaliwen iso a payci?
Ngaayay to , hakowa ko cacaliwen iso a payci?

Matawalay ako a miala to payci, ngaayay a micaliw kako kisonan to payci han?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

S.FORM: Awaay ko payci ako.
Awaay ko payci ako.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have any money either!

S.FORM: Matawalay ako a miala to payci, ngaayay a micaliw kako kisonan to payci han?
Matawalay ako a miala to payci, ngaayay a micaliw kako kisonan to payci han?
S.TRANSL: 我忘記帶錢了，我可以跟你借錢嗎?
I forgot to bring money, can I borrow money from you?

Naay, ya nicaliwan iso i nacila a payci cowa ho kapatikolen iso kako.

S.FORM: Ngaayay micaliw kako to riko' no miso han?
Ngaayay micaliw kako to riko' no miso han?

Ngaayay to, ala han niso.

Pacaliwen ho kako to tingsiya iso?

S.FORM: Hayda, kawrira i patikolen kako anocila.
Hayda, kawrira i patikolen kako anocila.
S.TRANSL: Okay, but you have to give it back to me tomorrow.

Maoraday to, cowa kapiala kako to dinay, Pacaliwen ho kako to dinay iso?
S.TRANSL: 下雨了，我沒有帶傘，借我傘好嗎?
It’s raining, I don’t have an umbrella, can you lend me your umbrella?

S.FORM: Cecayay ko dinay ako, malacafay kita ci dinay
Cecayay ko dinay ako, malacafay kita ci dinay
S.TRANSL: 我只有一把傘，我們一起撐吧!
I only have an umbrella, let’s stick together!

S.FORM: Yanicaliwan ako i naci:la a tilid, patikolen ako kiso.
Yanicaliwan ako i naci:la a tilid, patikolen ako kiso.

O manan ho ko nanengnengan iso a tilid, pasowal han to kako.

S.FORM: Hacowa a patikolen ako kiso to payci?
Hacowa a patikolen ako kiso to payci?

S.FORM: Ngaay to, ira to ko payci iso itiya sa to a mipatikol.
Ngaay to, ira to ko payci iso itiya sa to a mipatikol.

S.FORM: Hacowa a patikol kiso i takowanan to payci?
Hacowa a patikol kiso i takowanan to payci?

S.FORM: Patikolen ako kiso anocila.
Patikolen ako kiso anocila.

S.FORM: Hacowa a patikol kiso i takowanan to tilid?
Hacowa a patikol kiso i takowanan to tilid?

Mapatikolay to ako kiso i nacila kiya?

S.FORM: Pacaliwan ni Hokin kiso tona impic haw?
Pacaliwan ni Hokin kiso tona impic haw?

S.FORM: Hayi, nicaliwan ako anini cingra.
Hayi, nicaliwan ako anini cingra.

S.FORM: nicaliwan iso ci Hokin tona impic haw?
nicaliwan iso ci Hokin tona impic haw?

S.FORM: Cowa, o no ina niacaan
Cowa, o no ina niacaan
S.TRANSL: No, this is what mom bought.

Awaay to ko cinah, caliwen ho ko cinah ni Miding.

S.FORM: Hai, micaliw kako.
Hai, micaliw kako.

S.FORM: pina ko nicaliwan ningra a payci?
pina ko nicaliwan ningra a payci?

Talacowa kiso?
Tayla kako i padatengan a Mipaloma' to dateng.
Tayla kako i padatengan a Mipaloma' to dateng.
S.TRANSL: I’m going to plant vegetables in the garden.

S.FORM: Nimaanany kiso?
Nimaanany kiso?
karengos sanay, nifaliway to rengos kako, micefos ho ansawni.
karengos sanay, nifaliway to rengos kako, micefos ho ansawni.
S.TRANSL: 草太多了，在砍草，等一下要澆水。
There's too much grass, I'm cutting it, I'll have to water it later.

S.FORM: Taynien ho ko kawkaw ato pitaw?
Taynien ho ko kawkaw ato pitaw?
S.TRANSL: 幫我把鐮刀和鋤頭拿來好嗎?

S.FORM: Icowaan niso a miteli?
Icowaan niso a miteli?
I tatihi no kangkang a mateli.
I tatihi no kangkang a mateli.
S.TRANSL: Put it next to the plow rake.

S.FORM: Makangkangay to iso haw?
Makangkangay to iso haw?
S.TRANSL: Did you turn over the soil?

S.FORM: I sawniay ho kangkangen ako, nipaloma' ansawni.
I sawniay ho kangkangen ako, nipaloma' ansawni.
S.TRANSL: 我剛翻過土，等等要播種。

S.FORM: Ngaayay to a sidetengen ko dateng iso haw?
Ngaayay to a sidetengen ko dateng iso haw?

Ngaayay to a sidatengen ko tamana itini, cowa ho kangaay ko nangkokay a sidatengen.
S.TRANSL: 這裡的高麗菜可以收成了，那裡的昭和草還不能收成。

S.FORM: Watah! Adihay ko nikorkoran iso a konga.
Watah! Adihay ko nikorkoran iso a konga.
S.TRANSL: (sighs) Wow! You dug up so many gourds.

Pacafayen ho kako a miteli i kofaw haw?

S.FORM: Nimaanay kamo?
Nimaanay kamo?

Micadiwayay kami.

Adihayay ko foting itini haw?

Adihay to ko foting i kopid.

S.FORM: Samaanan iso a mifoting?
Samaanan iso a mifoting?

S.FORM: tano 'idocen no mako a mifoting.
tano 'idocen no mako a mifoting.

S.FORM: Mafana' kiso tano pana'en a miadop haw?
Mafana' kiso tano pana'en a miadop haw?

S.FORM: O talakal ko sapiadop no mako, olatek miolong to waco kowang a miadop.
O talakal ko sapiadop no mako, olatek miolong to waco kowang a miadop.

S.FORM: o nirakatan no fafoy koni a lalan
o nirakatan no fafoy koni a lalan
S.TRANSL: This is the road the boar took.

Ano mafana' kiso?

S.TRANSL: Lapic goes to school by train.

S.FORM: Samaanen niSawmah a tayra i kiwkay?
Samaanen niSawmah a tayra i kiwkay?
S.TRANSL: How does Saomah go to church?

S.FORM: Pakatingsaay tayra i kiwkay ciSaomah.
Pakatingsaay tayra i kiwkay ciSaomah.
S.TRANSL: Saomah goes to church by bicycle.

S.FORM: Pakacieying a mitilid kiso?
Pakacieying a mitilid kiso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by MRT?

S.FORM: Cowa, pakapasoay mitilid kako.
Cowa, pakapasoay mitilid kako.
S.TRANSL: No, I go to school by bus.

S.FORM: Pakatingsaay a mitilid kiso?
Pakatingsaay a mitilid kiso?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to school by bicycle?

S.FORM: Hai, pakatingsaay a mitilid kako.
Hai, pakatingsaay a mitilid kako.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to school by bicycle.

S.FORM: PakaKawti'ay kiso a tayra iTakaw?
PakaKawti'ay kiso a tayra iTakaw?
S.TRANSL: Do you go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail?

S.FORM: Hai, PakaKawti'ay kako a tayra iTakaw.
Hai, PakaKawti'ay kako a tayra iTakaw.
S.TRANSL: Yes, I go to Kaohsiung by High Speed Rail.

S.FORM: O kasoling anca o hikoki ko nikalican iso a tayra i Posong?
O kasoling anca o hikoki ko nikalican iso a tayra i Posong?
S.TRANSL: 你去台東搭火車還是搭飛機?
Are you going to Taitung by train or by plane?

S.FORM: O hikoki ko nikalican ako, kaliki ko hikoki to kasoling.
O hikoki ko nikalican ako, kaliki ko hikoki to kasoling.
S.TRANSL: 我搭飛機，搭飛機比搭火車快。
I will take the plane because it is faster than the train.

S.FORM: O paso anca parakatay kiso to paliding a tayra i kiwkay?
O paso anca parakatay kiso to paliding a tayra i kiwkay?
S.TRANSL: 你去教會搭公車還是開車?
Are you going to drive to the church or take the bus?

S.FORM: Tayra i kiwkay parakatay to paliding kako, madepoc a parakat to paliding to paso.
Tayra i kiwkay parakatay to paliding kako, madepoc a parakat to paliding to paso.
S.TRANSL: 我開車去教會，開車比搭公車方便。
I will drive to the church because it is more convenient than the bus.

S.FORM: O ciyn ciya a patiyamay mingataay to loma' namo?
O ciyn ciya a patiyamay mingataay to loma' namo?
S.TRANSL: Is the FamilyMart to your house?

S.FORM: Cowa ka ngata, pakaotopay sanay tayra i ciyn ciya a patiyamay kako.
Cowa ka ngata, pakaotopay sanay tayra i ciyn ciya a patiyamay kako.
S.TRANSL: 不近，我都騎摩托車去全家。
No, it is not, so I always ride the motorcycle to the FamilyMart.

S.FORM: Mangataay no Yofing ko kongkoan?
Mangataay no Yofing ko kongkoan?
S.TRANSL: Is the post office close to the school?

S.FORM: Mangataay, rakat sa tahira to.
Mangataay, rakat sa tahira to.
S.TRANSL: Yes, it is within walking distance.

S.FORM: Mangataay no ciyataw ko kakomaenan?
Mangataay no ciyataw ko kakomaenan?
S.TRANSL: Is the restaurant close to the station?

S.FORM: Lima a fon ko karomakat tahira to i ciyataw.
Lima a fon ko karomakat tahira to i ciyataw.
S.TRANSL: 出車站再走五分鐘就到了。
It only takes five minutes after you walk out of the station.

S.FORM: Ira ko romi'ad iso anini?
Ira ko romi'ad iso anini?
Makenaay saw?
Makenaay saw?
Sapiliso'an kako tisowanan.
Sapiliso'an kako tisowanan.
S.TRANSL: I would like to visit you.

S.FORM: Ira ko tayal anini awa kako i loma, liyaw hanto a romi'ad.
Ira ko tayal anini awa kako i loma, liyaw hanto a romi'ad.
S.TRANSL: 我今天有事不在家。改天吧。
I am out today. How about another day?

S.FORM: Anocila i, ira ko romi'ad iso? helek no lahok tayra kako tisowanan.
Anocila i, ira ko romi'ad iso? helek no lahok tayra kako tisowanan.
S.TRANSL: 那你明天有空嗎?我下午去找你。
Then, are you available tomorrow? I’ll visit you tomorrow afternoon.

S.FORM: Nga'ayay to, tala hanto ako kiso iloma'.
Nga'ayay to, tala hanto ako kiso iloma'.
S.TRANSL: Sure, I will wait for you at home.

S.FORM: Wanga'ay kako miluing haw? o mamikirok kako.
Wanga'ay kako miloing haw? o mamikirok kako.
S.TRANSL: 請問我可以錄音嗎?我想做紀錄。
Would you mind if I do the voice recording? I would like to keep a record.

S.FORM: Hayda! man ko kena.
Hayda! man ko kena.
Wanga'ay miluing haw?
Wanga'ay miloing haw?
S.TRANSL: Would you mind if I do the video recording?

S.FORM: Cakasanengseng kako a nengnengen, o kofaw hanaca caho kasolimet, aka to hena.
Cakasanengseng kako a nengnengen, o kofaw hanaca caho kasolimet, aka to hena.
S.TRANSL: 我不好看，倉庫也沒整理，不要啦。
No, I am plain and the warehouse hasn’t been tidied up yet.

S.FORM: Ano hatira i, sasing han no mako.
Ano hatira i, sasing han no mako.
S.TRANSL: Then I will just take photos.

S.FORM: Aka to sasingen.
Aka to sasingen.
Ahowiday ko pihomong iso takowanan.
Ahowiday ko pihomong iso takowanan.
S.TRANSL: Thank you for accepting the interview.

S.FORM: Nga'ay to, o maan ko lalicayen iso?
Nga'ay to, o maan ko lalicayen iso?
S.TRANSL: You are welcome. What would you like to know?

S.FORM: Licayay ho, nimaanay kiso ya kapah ho?
Licayay ho, nimaanay kiso ya kapah ho?
S.TRANSL: 請問您年輕時是做什麼的?
What do you do when you are young?

S.FORM: Itiya ho malaImengay kako, mitoysiw to anini.
Itiya ho malaImengay kako, mitoysiw to anini.
S.TRANSL: 我以前是警察，但我現在退休了。
I was a police officer but I am retired now.

S.FORM: O maan ko tayal iso anini?
O maan ko tayal iso anini?
S.TRANSL: Then, are you working at the moment?

S.FORM: I kongkoan kako matayal no hatini.
I kongkoan kako matayal no hatini.
O wawa iso i niyaro'ay ko aro' nira haw?
O wawa iso i niyaro'ay ko aro' nira haw?
S.TRANSL: 您的孩子他住在部落嗎?
Do your kids live in the tribe too?

S.FORM: Cowa, itiniay i tokay ko aro' no wawa ako.
Cowa, itiniay i tokay ko aro' no wawa ako.
S.TRANSL: 不，我的孩子在都市居住。
No, my kids are all living in the city.

S.FORM: Cecayay kiso a mikiloma' haw?
Cecayay kiso a mikiloma' haw?
S.TRANSL: Then, do you live by yourself?

S.FORM: Ira ko cecay to nipa'oripan ako a waco ato cecay a 'ayam, todong to o tamdaw no loma' ako.
Ira ko cecay to nipa'oripan ako a waco ato cecay a 'ayam, todong to o tamdaw no loma' ako.
S.TRANSL: 我還有養一隻狗和一隻鳥，他們也是我的家人。
I also keep a dog and a bird. They are my family.

S.FORM: Ira haca ko cecay to nipa'oripan no mako a ngiyaw, ira ko pinanowang pacafay hay cakalaholac ko 'orip.
Ira haca ko cecay to nipa'oripan no mako a ngiyaw, ira ko pinanowang pacafay hay cakalaholac ko 'orip.
S.TRANSL: 我也有養一隻貓，有動物陪伴生活才不會無聊。
I have a cat too. I won’t get bored with the company of my pet.

S.FORM: Licayen ho ako kiso, pakayni to mi'adopay iraay ko kapaysinan a demak.
Licayen ho ako kiso, pakayni to mi'adopay iraay ko kapaysinan a demak.
S.TRANSL: 我想請問你，關於打獵的禁忌。
I would like to ask you about the taboos of hunting.

S.FORM: Caka hakowa ko kafana'an no mako, ano ira ko kafana'an no mako paca'of han to ako kiso.
Caka hakowa ko kafana'an no mako, ano ira ko kafana'an no mako paca'of han to ako kiso.
S.TRANSL: 我知道的不多，但我能回答的都會回答你。
I don’t know much about that, but I will tell you everything I know.

S.FORM: O sapi'adop namo a talakal iraay ko kapaysinan haw?
O sapi'adop namo a talakal iraay ko kapaysinan haw?
S.TRANSL: 你們打獵的武器有什麼禁忌嗎?
Do you have any taboos about hunting weapons?

S.FORM: O sapi'adop niyam a talakal, tatiih ko fafahiyan a mitefing.
O sapi'adop niyam a talakal, tatiih ko fafahiyan a mitefing.
S.TRANSL: 我們打獵的武器不可以讓女生碰到。
Our hunting weapons are untouchable to women.

S.FORM: Cowa kanga'ay ko fafahiyan a mi'adop?
Cowa kanga'ay ko fafahiyan a mi'adop?
S.TRANSL: 那女人可以一起去打獵嗎?
Then, can women go hunting together?

S.FORM: Cowa kanga'ay, tatiih ko fafahiyan a mi'adop.
Cowa kanga'ay, tatiih ko fafahiyan a mi'adop.
S.TRANSL: 不行，女人也不可以打獵。
No, women cannot go hunting either.

S.FORM: Tamih, awaay to ko miciw i loma', mi'aca ho to miciw.
Tamih, awaay to ko miciw i loma', mi'aca ho to miciw.
S.TRANSL: Tamih，家裡沒有米酒了，你去買米酒。
Tamih, our home is out of rice wine, please go and buy some.

S.FORM: Iraay ho i cawka ko cecay a talid, hamanay to a mi'aca!
Iraay ho i cawka ko cecay a talid, hamanay to a mi'aca!
S.TRANSL: 廚房裡還有一瓶，不用買吧!
There is still one bottle left in the kitchen, so there is no need to buy one!

S.FORM: Cango'ot ko cecay a talid, tosaen a talid ko ni'acaan.
Cango'ot ko cecay a talid, tosaen a talid ko ni'acaan.
S.TRANSL: 一瓶不夠，再去買兩瓶回來。
One bottle is not enough for me, go and buy two more back.

S.FORM: Mami'aca kako to miciw, paliwalay kamo?
Mami'aca kako to miciw, paliwalay kamo?
S.TRANSL: 我要買米酒，你們有賣嗎?
I am looking for rice wine. Do you have any rice wine?

S.FORM: Iraay! pina ko 'a'acaen no miso?
Iraay! pina ko 'a'acaen no miso?
S.TRANSL: Yes! How many bottles do you need?

S.FORM: Tosa a talid ko 'a'acaen no mako, mi'aca ho to cecay tafo a felac.
Tosa a talid ko 'a'acaen no mako, mi'aca ho to cecay tafo a felac.
S.TRANSL: 我要買兩瓶，還要買一包米。
I want two bottles and a pack of rice.

S.FORM: Ini ko felac, o maan ho ko 'a'acaen iso?
Ini ko felac, o maan ho ko 'a'acaen iso?
S.TRANSL: 米在這裡，你還要買什麼嗎?
Here is the rice, what else do you need?

S.FORM: Mami'aca ho kako to fita'ol, iraay ko namo?
Mami'aca ho kako to fita'ol, iraay ko namo?
S.TRANSL: I want some eggs too, do you have some?

S.FORM: Maeminay to a mapaliwal ko fita'ol niyam.
Maeminay to a mapaliwal ko fita'ol niyam.
O mami'aca kako to riko'.
O mami'aca kako to riko'.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Masamaanay ko 'a'acaen no miso?
Masamaanay ko 'a'acaen no miso?
S.TRANSL: 你想要買什麼樣子的呢?
What kind of clothes do you like?

S.FORM: O kamoko'ay ko caca'edongan a riko' ko 'a'acaen no mako.
O kamoko'ay ko caca'edongan a riko' ko 'a'acaen no mako.
S.TRANSL: I want to buy the clothes with short sleeves.

S.FORM: Onini kahengangay mamanay?
Onini kahengangay mamanay?
Iraay ho ko roma a cengel?
Iraay ho ko roma a cengel?
O kohecalay ato langdaway iraay ho.
O kohecalay ato langdaway iraay ho.
S.TRANSL: We have white and blue ones too.

S.FORM: Dadada taynien ko cecay langdaway a riko'.
Dadada taynien ko cecay langdaway a riko'.
S.TRANSL: 請給我一件藍色的衣服。
Please give me the clothes in blue.

S.FORM: Aling, talacowaay kiso i sawni? Mionto kiso?
Aling, talacowaay kiso i sawni? Mionto kiso?
S.TRANSL: Aling你剛剛去哪裡了?你去運動嗎?
Aling, where have you been just now? Did you go exercising?

S.FORM: Cowa, patadoay kako cifofoan a mi'aca to dateng.
Cowa, patadoay kako cifofoan a mi'aca to dateng.
S.TRANSL: No, I went grocery shopping for my grandma.

S.FORM: Hayhan, ira ko romi'ad iso to dadaya? Malacafay kita a malafi ano dadaya makahi kiso?
Hayhan, ira ko romi'ad iso to dadaya? Malacafay kita a malafi ano dadaya makahi kiso?
S.TRANSL: 這樣啊，你晚上如果有空?要不要和我一起吃晚餐?
No wonder! Are you available at night? Would you like to have a meal with me?

S.FORM: Cato, o mami'aca to riko' kako.
Cato, o mami'aca to riko' kako.
S.TRANSL: No, I want to buy some clothes.

S.FORM: Anosanay i, mitoor kako tisowanan a tayra.
Anosanay i, mitoor kako tisowanan a tayra.
S.TRANSL: Then, I will go with you.

S.FORM: Nga'ay ho kiso, pinaay ko 'aca nona dateng?
Nga'ay ho kiso, pinaay ko 'aca nona dateng?
S.TRANSL: 你好，請問這把菜多少錢?
Hello, how much is this bunch of vegetables?

S.FORM: Tosa polo' ko cecay a lolong.
Tosa polo' ko cecay a lolong.
S.TRANSL: The vegetables are $20 for a bunch.

S.FORM: Pina ko 'aca nona konga?
Pina ko 'aca nona konga?
S.TRANSL: How much are these sweet potatoes?

S.FORM: Cecay a tingting tolo polo' ko 'aca nona konga.
Cecay a tingting tolo polo' ko 'aca nona konga.
S.TRANSL: Sweet potatoes are thirty dollars for a pound.

S.FORM: Dadada, pafelien kako toya cecay tingting a konga ato dateng.
Dadada, pafelien kako toya cecay tingting a konga ato dateng.
S.TRANSL: 請給我兩把菜和一斤地瓜。
Please give me two bunches of vegetables and a pound of sweet potatoes.

S.FORM: Nikar, matawalay ako miala ko impac, pacaliwen ho kako?
Nikar, matawalay ako miala ko impac, pacaliwen ho kako?
S.TRANSL: Nikar，我忘了帶筆，你可以借我嗎?
Nikar, I forgot to bring my pen. Can you lend me one?

S.FORM: Awaay ko mako, o niPanay konini.
Awaay ko mako, o niPanay konini.
S.TRANSL: I don’t have one either. This is Panay’s.

S.FORM: Nga'ay pacaliwen ho kako haw? Halikien to ako a patikol kiso.
Nga'ay pacaliwen ho kako haw? Halikien to ako a patikol kiso.
S.TRANSL: 那可以借我一下子嗎?我很快就還你。
Can you lend me the pen for a second? I will return to you immediately.

S.FORM: Hayda, na alaen.
Hayda, na alaen.
Ahowiday, patadoen to kako a miahowiday ciPanay.
Ahowiday, patadoen to kako a miahowiday ciPanay.
S.TRANSL: Thank you and thank Panay for me.

S.FORM: O maan ho ko sasaalien iso?
O maan ho ko sasaalien iso?
O papatikol kako tona tosa a tilid.
O papatikol kako tona tosa a tilid.
S.TRANSL: I want to return these two books.

S.FORM: Hayda, o maan ho ko sasaalien iso?
Hayda, o maan ho ko sasaalien iso?
S.TRANSL: No problem and what else do you need?

S.FORM: O mamicalw kako to tolo a tilid.
O mamicalw kako to tolo a tilid.
S.TRANSL: I would like to borrow these three books.

S.FORM: Hayda, haratengen tolo a romi'ad patikolen a patayni.
Hayda, haratengen tolo a romi'ad patikolen a patayni.
S.TRANSL: 好的。記得三天後要拿來還。
Sure and remember to return them after three days.

S.FORM: Iraay ho ko sasipasip iso.
Iraay ho ko sasipasip iso.
S.TRANSL: You haven’t returned me the eraser.

S.FORM: Mapatikolay to ako inacila.
Mapatikolay to ako inacila.
Mana malahedaw koya sasipasip no mako.
Mana malahedaw koya sasipasip no mako.
S.TRANSL: 那我的橡皮擦怎麼不見了。
Then, why is my eraser missing?

S.FORM: Nipacaliwan iso ciKacaw?
Nipacaliwan iso ciKacaw?
S.TRANSL: Did you lend it to Kacaw?

S.FORM: Cowa to kaharateng no mako, hena licayen ho ako cingra.
Cowa to kaharateng no mako, hena licayen ho ako cingra.
S.TRANSL: I don’t know. I will go and ask her.

S.FORM: Pacaliwen no mako to sasipasip kiso.
Pacaliwen no mako to sasipasip kiso.
S.TRANSL: I will lend you my eraser first.

S.FORM: Panay, nipacaliwan niKacaw to kafang kiso?
Panay, nipacaliwan niKacaw to kafang kiso?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did Kacaw lend you this coat?

S.FORM: Cowa, o ni'acaan no wina ako to hamako konini.
Cowa, o ni'acaan no wina ako to hamako konini.
S.TRANSL: 不是，這是我媽媽買給我的。
No, my mom bought it for me.

S.FORM: Mahecad to niKacaw a kafang.
Mahecad to niKacaw a kafang.
S.TRANSL: Kacaw’s coat is the same as yours.

S.FORM: O kohetingay a kafang ko niKacaw, cowa kahecad ko cengel niyam.
O kohetingay a kafang ko niKacaw, cowa kahecad ko cengel niyam.
S.TRANSL: 他的外套是黑色的，我們的顏色不一樣。
His coat is black, so our colors are different.

S.FORM: Panay, micaliway to payci niKacaw kiso?
Panay, micaliway to payci niKacaw kiso?
S.TRANSL: Panay, did you borrow money from Kacaw?

S.FORM: Hai, o papatikolen no mako cingra anini, matawalay no mako a mihawikid ko payci.
Hai, o papatikolen no mako cingra anini, matawalay no mako a mihawikid ko payci.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我本來今天要還他，我忘記帶錢了。
Yes, I was supposed to return to him today, but I forgot to bring the money.

S.FORM: Ya hacowaen to iso a patikol?
Ya hacowaen to iso a patikol?
S.TRANSL: Then, when will you return the money?

S.FORM: Anocila hanto ako a patikol cingra.
Anocila hanto ako a patikol cingra.
S.TRANSL: I will return to him tomorrow.

S.FORM: Hayda, sowal hanto ako ciKacaw.
Hayda, sowal hanto ako ciKacaw.
S.TRANSL: Okay, I will tell Kacaw for you.

S.FORM: O fakeloh ko sapitalakal to 'edo a mi'enec, roma i, o wa'il ko sapitalakal to tolok a milamec, matatodongay haenen.
O fakeloh ko sapitalakal to 'edo a mi'enec, roma i, o wa'il ko sapitalakal to tolok a milamec, matatodongay haenen.
S.TRANSL: 老鼠應該要⽤⽯壓式陷阱抓，雉雞應該要⽤套頸式陷阱抓，這樣才對。
It is correct to catch mice through rangay and catch bamboo partridges through qjiulang.

S.FORM: Mahaenay han, mararaway ko demak ako! salaw awa ko ma'adpay no mako.
Mahaenay han, mararaway ko demak ako! salaw awa ko ma'adpay no mako.
S.TRANSL: 原來是這樣，我都搞錯了！難怪我都抓不到。
No wonder! I am mistaken and that’s why I cannot catch any of them.

S.FORM: Liyawen haca ako pakafana' kiso misanga' to talakal.
Liyawen haca ako pakafana' kiso misanga' to talakal.
S.TRANSL: 那我再教你怎麼製作這兩種陷阱。
Then I will teach you how to set up these two traps.

S.FORM: wata! kahemekan to! Ano miliyaw mi'adop haenen to ako a mitalakal nga' citama'.
wata! kahemekan to! Ano miliyaw mi'adop haenen to ako a mitalakal nga' citama'.
S.TRANSL: 好啊！太棒了!這樣我以後就會抓到獵物了。
Great! I will be able to catch the prey in the future.

S.FORM: Alaen ko kawkaw ikofaw, tayra kita i omah nifaliw to semot, 'akawangay to ko semot iomah.
Alaen ko kawkaw ikofaw, tayra kita i omah nifaliw to semot, 'akawangay to ko semot iomah.
S.TRANSL: 去倉庫拿鐮刀，我們去田裡砍草，田裡的草太高了。
Go to the warehouse to get the sickle, we go to the field to cut the grass, the grass in the field is too high.

S.FORM: I cowaan miteli ko kawkaw?
I cowaan miteli ko kawkaw?
Itiraay ifati'ian no tanomal, comod sa kiso ma'araw to.
Itiraay ifati'ian no tanomal, comod sa kiso ma'araw to.
S.TRANSL: 在圓簍的旁邊，你進去倉庫就會看到了。
It is next to the round basket. You will see it when you enter the warehouse.

S.FORM: Na'onen miala, cihinangay ko kawkaw.
Na'onen miala, cihinangay ko kawkaw.
S.TRANSL: Be careful and don’t get hurt. The sickle is very sharp.

S.FORM: Aka ripa'en ko talakal ako!
Aka ripa'en ko talakal ako!
I cowaan iso miteli ko talakal?
I cowaan iso miteli ko talakal?
I laeno no kilang a telien no mako ko talakal.
I laeno no kilang a telien no mako ko talakal.
S.TRANSL: 我的陷阱在那棵樹的下面。
My trap is under that tree.

S.FORM: Mana cakatawal iso?
Mana cakatawal iso?
Ira itira ko nikonisan ako, mafana' kako to icowaan ako miteli ko talakal.
Ira itira ko nikonisan ako, mafana' kako to icowaan ako miteli ko talakal.
S.TRANSL: 我在這邊有做記號，我知道我的陷阱在哪裡。
I make a mark here, so I know where my trap is.

S.FORM: O foefo koni, telien no mita i lawac no 'alo a mifoting.
O foefo koni, telien no mita i lawac no 'alo a mifoting.
S.TRANSL: 這是魚筌，我們放在溪邊捕魚。
This is a fish trap which we put beside the river for fishing.

S.FORM: Awaay itira ko foefo niyam, o pacemot ko sapifoting niyam.
Awaay itira ko foefo niyam, o pacemot ko sapifoting niyam.
S.TRANSL: 我們那邊沒有魚筌，我們都用釣竿抓魚。
We don’t have any fish traps there, so we catch fish with a fishing rod.

S.FORM: Caho pitanam kako a mipacemot, anocila pakafana' han to kako?
Caho pitanam kako a mipacemot, anocila pakafana' han to kako?
S.TRANSL: 我沒有用過釣竿，你下次教我好嗎?
I have never used a fishing rod before, would you mind teaching me next time?

S.FORM: Hai, anocila malacafay kita a mipacemot.
Hai, anocila malacafay kita a mipacemot.
S.TRANSL: 好啊!我們下次一起去釣魚。
Sure! Let’s go fishing together next time.

S.FORM: Liyaw to a romi'ad pakafana' han to ako misanga' to foefoe kiso.
Liyaw to a romi'ad pakafana' han to ako misanga' to foefoe kiso.
S.TRANSL: I will teach you how to make a fish trap next time.

S.FORM: Tatemikay to ko pacemot iso, mapacemotay to ko foting alatek, halikien a mitengteng.
Tatemikay to ko pacemot iso, mapacemotay to ko foting alatek, halikien a mitengteng.
S.TRANSL: 你的釣竿動了，是不是有魚上鉤了!你快拉起來。
Your fishing rod is moving. Isn’t the fish on the hook? Pull it up!

S.FORM: Aka ho, ngiyangi sanay ko tamina. Itini sa kako mitengteng to pacemot, patadoen ho kako tayra miala to salil.
Aka ho, ngiyangi sanay ko tamina. Itini sa kako mitengteng to pacemot, patadoen ho kako tayra miala to salil.
S.TRANSL: 等等，船太搖動了。我在這邊拉釣竿，去那邊幫我拿網子來。
Wait, the ship is rolling heavily. I am here to pull the fishing rod and you should go there to grab me the net.

S.FORM: Tengtengen patayni kora foting, patadoen no mako kiso a mitengteng.
Tengtengen patayni kora foting, patadoen no mako kiso a mitengteng.
S.TRANSL: 你把魚拉到我這邊。我幫妳拉起來。
Pull the fish to my side and I will help you pull it up.

S.FORM: Wata! ka kadofa anini, matomes ko kopid.
Wata! ka kadofa anini, matomes ko kopid.
S.TRANSL: 太好了!今天大豐收，魚簍都裝滿了。
Great! It is a bumper crop today with full fish baskets.

S.FORM: Halikien a minokay papalilamen no mita ko salawinawina.
Halikien a minokay papalilamen no mita ko salawinawina.
S.TRANSL: 我們快回去跟親戚分享。
Let’s go back immediately and share it with everyone.

S.FORM: Tayniay to ko singsi.
Tayniay to ko singsi.
Aka to pihalama, kalikien a maro' i kamaro'an.
Aka to pihalama, kalikien a maro' i kamaro'an.
S.TRANSL: 不要再玩了，快坐在座位上。
Stop playing and quickly sit in your seat.

S.FORM: Kangodoan to, maapacay to kako!
Kangodoan to, maapacay to kako!
Kalikien a micomod!
Kalikien a micomod!
O sakapian no lipay anini?
O sakapian no lipay anini?
O sakalima no lipay anini, pahanhan to anocila, ata malacafay a mihalama!
O sakalima no lipay anini, pahanhan to anocila, ata malacafay a mihalama!
S.TRANSL: 今天星期五，明天放假，一起出去玩吧!
It’s Friday today, we have a day off tomorrow. Let’s go out and play together!

S.FORM: Hayda! tayra kita i 'alo.
Hayda! tayra kita i 'alo.
S.TRANSL: Great! Let’s go to the riverside.

S.FORM: O sakapina no lipay anocila?
O sakapina no lipay anocila?
S.TRANSL: What day will it be tomorrow?

S.FORM: O sakatolo no lipay anocila, mihalama kita to mali to herek no lahok no cila!
O sakatolo no lipay anocila, mihalama kita to mali to herek no lahok no cila!
S.TRANSL: 明天星期三，我們明天下午去玩球吧!
Tomorrow will be Wednesday. Let’s go play ball tomorrow afternoon!

S.FORM: Mamimaan kiso anodafak?
Mamimaan kiso anodafak?
S.TRANSL: What will you be doing tomorrow morning?

S.FORM: O pilipayan anocila, tatayra kako ato wina i kiwkay.
O pilipayan anocila, tatayra kako ato wina i kiwkay.
S.TRANSL: 明天是星期日，我要和媽媽去教會。
Tomorrow will be Sunday, I will be going to church with my mom.

S.FORM: Mamaanay kiso?
Mamaanay kiso?
Sakaota'aw sanay kako, tayra ho kako i tata'ian.
Sakaota'aw sanay kako, tayra ho kako i tata'ian.
S.TRANSL: I feel like vomiting. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Sinawar sa ko fongoh ako.
Sinawar sa ko fongoh ako.
Hinefa han iso a mipasela'.
Hinefa han iso a mipasela'.
Singsi, adada ko tiyad ako, tayra ho kako i tata'ian.
Singsi, adada ko tiyad ako, tayra ho kako i tata'ian.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我肚子痛，要去廁所。
Teacher, I have a stomachache. I need to go to the restroom.

S.FORM: Hayda, olioli!
Hayda, olioli!
Manga'ay kako minanaw to kamay han?
Manga'ay kako minanaw to kamay han?
S.TRANSL: May I go wash my hands?

S.FORM: Mamipasera' to, sawni to!
Mamipasera' to, sawni to!
S.TRANSL: It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Singsi, adada ko fongoh ako, mamipahanhan kako to herek no lahok.
Singsi, adada ko fongoh ako, mamipahanhan kako to herek no lahok.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我頭好痛，下午要請假。
It’s almost time for class to end. Wait a little longer.

S.FORM: Hayda, na'onen ko pinokay!
Hayda, na'onen ko pinokay!
S.TRANSL: Okay, take care and go home.

S.FORM: Singsi, wa mamipahanhan kako to anocila a sakacecay no lipay, wa mamipaising kako.
Singsi, wa mamipahanhan kako to anocila a sakacecay no lipay, wa mamipaising kako.
S.TRANSL: 老師，我下禮拜一要請假，我要去看醫生。
Teacher, I need to take a sick leave next Monday. I have to see a doctor.

S.FORM: Hayda, sanga'ayen ko tireng.
Hayda, sanga'ayen ko tireng.
Icowaay ci Panay?
Icowaay ci Panay?
Adadaay ko tiyad ningra, Ira i tata'ian cingra.
Adadaay ko tiyad ningra, Ira i tata'ian cingra.
S.TRANSL: She has a stomachache. She’s in the restroom.

S.FORM: Icowaay ci Kacaw?
Icowaay ci Kacaw?
Singsi, adadaay ko takolaw ni Kacaw, pahanhanay anini.
Singsi, adadaay ko takolaw ni Kacaw, pahanhanay anini.
S.TRANSL: Teacher, Kacaw has a sore throat. She took a sick leave today.

S.FORM: Hano awa tayni ci Panay?
Hano awa tayni ci Panay?
O malalisanay cingra.
O malalisanay cingra.
Pakafana'en ho kami to cima kiso!
Pakafana'en ho kami to cima kiso!
Ci Noami Kulas kako, mo^tepay to ko mihecaan no mako.
Ci Noami Kolas kako, mo^tepay to ko mihecaan no mako.
S.TRANSL: My name is Noami Kulas, and I’m 10 years old.

S.FORM: Cima ko ngangan no miso?
Cima ko ngangan no miso?
Ci Noami Kulas kako.
Ci Noami Kolas kako.
O maanan a finacadan a wawa kiso?
O maanan a finacadan a wawa kiso?
S.TRANSL: What ethnic group are you from?

S.FORM: O no 'Amis a wawa kako.
O no 'Amis a wawa kako.
Saheto o Yencomin ko palo no loma' iso han?
Saheto o Yencomin ko palo no loma' iso han?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Hay, Saheto o 'Amis ko palo no loma' niyam.
Hay, Saheto o 'Amis ko palo no loma' niyam.
S.TRANSL: 是的，我們全家都是阿美族人。
Yes, my whole family is Amis.

S.FORM: Saheto o Yincomin ko palo no loma' iso han?
Saheto o Yincomin ko palo no loma' iso han?
S.TRANSL: 你的家人都是原住民嗎?
Are all your family members indigenous?

S.FORM: Cowa, o 'Amis ko wama ako, o payrang ko wina ako.
Cowa, o 'Amis ko wama ako, o payrang ko wina ako.
S.TRANSL: 不是，我的爸爸是阿美族，我的媽媽是漢人。
No, my father is Amis, and my mother is Han Taiwanese.

S.FORM: O nima a wawa kiso?
O nima a wawa kiso?
O wawa ni Mayaw Lohok kako.
O wawa ni Mayaw Lohok kako.
O wama iso kora han? Pinaay to ko mihecaan ningra?
O wama iso kora han? Pinaay to ko mihecaan ningra?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: ^Enem polo' to ko mihecaan ningra.
^Enem polo' to ko mihecaan ningra.
O wama iso kora han? Pinaay to ko mihecaan ningra?
O wama iso kora han? Pinaay to ko mihecaan ningra?
S.TRANSL: 那位是你爸爸嗎? 他幾歲了?
Is that your father? How old is he?

S.FORM: Cowa, o malitengay no niyaro' niyam cingra , falo polo' to ko mihecaan ningra.
Cowa, o malitengay no niyaro' niyam cingra , falo polo' to ko mihecaan ningra.
S.TRANSL: 不是，他是我們部落的耆老，他80歲了。
No, he is an elder of our tribe. He is 80 years old.

S.FORM: Pinaay to ko mihecaan no fa'inayan a kaka iso?
Pinaay to ko mihecaan no fa'inayan a kaka iso?
Mo^tep ira ko falo to ko mihecaan no fa'inayan a kaka ako.
Mo^tep ira ko falo to ko mihecaan no fa'inayan a kaka ako.
Adihayay ko kaikaka no mihecaan to fa'inayan a kaka iso i tisowanan han?
Adihayay ko kaikaka no mihecaan to fa'inayan a kaka iso i tisowanan han?
S.TRANSL: 你哥哥年紀比你大很多嗎?
Is your brother much older than you?

S.FORM: Lima a mihecaan ko kalala'ed niyam.
Lima a mihecaan ko kalala'ed niyam.
Hakowaay ko ka'akawang iso?
Hakowaay ko ka'akawang iso?
Cecay so'ot ira ko sepat polo' a kongfen ko 'akawang ako.
Cecay so'ot ira ko sepat polo' a kongfen ko 'akawang ako.
Halafin to cowa kasasi'araw, 'akawangay to kiso han?
Halafin to cowa kasasi'araw, 'akawangay to kiso han?
S.TRANSL: 好久不見，你是不是長高了?
I haven’t seen you in a while. Have you grown taller?

S.FORM: Hay, Cecay so'ot ira ko tolo polo' ko ka'akawang ako.
Hay, Cecay so'ot ira ko tolo polo' ko ka'akawang ako.
O maso^soay kiso haw?
O maso^soay kiso haw?
Cowa, mararaway ko pinengneng iso.
Cowa, mararaway ko pinengneng iso.
Mangiliway to kiso?
Mangiliway to kiso?
Cowa, maso^soay kako.
Cowa, maso^soay kako.
Maso^soay kiso haw?
Maso^soay kiso haw?
Hay, tolo polo' to ko tingting ako.
Hay, tolo polo' to ko tingting ako.
O tatalacowa kiso?
O tatalacowa kiso?
Wa tatayra kako i katayalan mikilim to singsian.
Wa tatayra kako i katayalan mikilim to singsian.
S.TRANSL: I'm going to the office to see the teacher.

S.FORM: O tatalacowa ci Kacaw?
O tatalacowa ci Kacaw?
O mamifalah cingra to lakaw.
O mamifalah cingra to lakaw.
S.TRANSL: He's going to throw away the trash.

S.FORM: Icowaay ci Kacaw?
Icowaay ci Kacaw?
I pidangoyan cingra, wa mamilifet to midangoyay cingra anosawni.
I pidangoyan cingra, wa mamilifet to midangoyay cingra anosawni.
S.TRANSL: 他在游泳池，他等一下要比賽游泳。
He's at the swimming pool. He's going to compete in a swimming competition later.

S.FORM: Icowaay ci Panay? wa mamilifet to comikayay cingra anosawni.
Icowaay ci Panay? wa mamilifet to comikayay cingra anosawni.
S.TRANSL: Panay在哪裡?她等一下要比賽跑步。
Where is Panay? She's going to compete in a running competition later.

S.FORM: Ira i Li-tan cingra, pohayen ako cingra.
Ira i Li-tan cingra, pohayen ako cingra.
S.TRANSL: She's in the auditorium. I'll go call her.

S.FORM: Ta mahakelong kita tayra i piontoan.
Ta mahakelong kita tayra i piontoan.
S.TRANSL: Let's go to the playground together.

S.FORM: Mi'aca ho kako to sakalahok, kilim han to ako kiso anosawni.
Mi'aca ho kako to sakalahok, kilim han to ako kiso anosawni.
S.TRANSL: 我先去買午餐，等一下去找你。
I'll go buy lunch first, and then I'll meet you later.

S.FORM: Ta malacafay kita mililid to patafoan!
Ta malacafay kita mililid to patafoan!
S.TRANSL: Let's carry the lunch boxes together!

S.FORM: Kilim han ho iso ko tao, wa mamikilim kako to singsian.
Kilim han ho iso ko tao, wa mamikilim kako to singsian.
S.TRANSL: 你找別人，我要去找老師。
You find someone else, I'm going to find the teacher.

S.FORM: Wa malalifet to mitekong to mali ci Kacaw anini han?
Wa malalifet to mitekong to mali ci Kacaw anini han?
S.TRANSL: Is Kacaw competing in croquet today?

S.FORM: Cowa, wa mamilifet to mitelocay cingra.
Cowa, wa mamilifet to mitelocay cingra.
S.TRANSL: No, he's competing in high jump.

S.FORM: Ira ko lalifeten iso toya piontokayan a romi'ad han?
Ira ko lalifeten iso toya piontokayan a romi'ad han?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Ira to, wa mamilifet kako to comikayay.
Ira to, wa mamilifet kako to comikayay.
Ira ko lalifeten iso toya piontokayan a romi'ad han?
Ira ko lalifeten iso toya piontokayan a romi'ad han?
S.TRANSL: 運動會那天你會上場比賽嗎?
Will you compete in the sports day?

S.FORM: Wa mamilifet kako to mitekong to mali.
Wa mamilifet kako to mitekong to mali.
Mamimaan kita toay piontokayan a romi'ad?
Mamimaan kita toay piontokayan a romi'ad?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會那天要做甚麼?
What will we do in the sports day?

S.FORM: Wa mamilifet kita to matatengteng to saso'ot.
Wa mamilifet kita to matatengteng to saso'ot.
S.TRANSL: We will compete in tug of war.

S.FORM: Wa mamipa'aca kita to kakaenen i piontokayan han?
Wa mamipa'aca kita to kakaenen i piontokayan han?
S.TRANSL: 我們運動會要賣食物嗎?
Will we sell food at the sports day?

S.FORM: Cowa, wa mamipa'aca kita to kikoya.
Cowa, wa mamipa'aca kita to kikoya.
Pakaalaay kiso to sakacecay, tadaidahiay to!
Pakaalaay kiso to sakacecay, tadaidahiay to!
S.TRANSL: 你獲得了第一名耶，真是厲害！
Congratulations on getting first place! You're amazing!

S.FORM: ko'iday!
ko'iday!
Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Iraay, mafoti'ay i kafatian cingra.
Iraay, mafoti'ay i kafatian cingra.
S.TRANSL: Yes, she’s sleeping in her room.

S.FORM: Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Awaay, hadak sanay ho isawni cingra i, O dadaya ko pinokayan ningra.
Awaay, hadak sanay ho isawni cingra i, O dadaya ko pinokayan ningra.
S.TRANSL: 不在，她剛出去了，要晚上才回家。
No, she’s not. She just went out and will be back in the evening.

S.FORM: Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Iraay ci fofo i loma' han?
Ira i sakatosa a tinglohan, cakat han iso a mikilim cingraan.
Ira i sakatosa a tinglohan, cakat han iso a mikilim cingraan.
S.TRANSL: 他在二樓，你上去找他吧。
He’s upstairs. You can go up and find him.

S.FORM: Iraay ko i lomaay haw?
Iraay ko i lomaay haw?
Ci Kacaw fofo han! halafin cowa to ka'araw kiso, nga'ayay ho kiso?
Ci Kacaw fofo han! halafin cowa to ka'araw kiso, nga'ayay ho kiso?
S.TRANSL: 是Kacaw阿公，很久沒有看到你了，你好嗎?
It’s Kacaw. I haven’t seen you in a while! How have you been?

S.FORM: Tadanga'ayay to, mikilim tisowanan malalicalicay.
Tadanga'ayay to, mikilim tisowanan malalicalicay.
S.TRANSL: I’m doing great! I came to chat with you.

S.FORM: Icowaay ko wama iso?
Icowaay ko wama iso?
Misafelay i cawka cingra , tahidangen ho ako cingra.
Misafelay i cawka cingra , tahidangen ho ako cingra.
S.TRANSL: 他在廚房炒菜，我去叫他。
He’s in the kitchen cooking. Let me go call him.

S.FORM: Talacowaay ci Panay?
Talacowaay ci Panay?
Tayra i pakoko'an cingra milepel to koko'.
Tayra i pakoko'an cingra milepel to koko'.
S.TRANSL: She went to the chicken coop to catch chickens.

S.FORM: Fofo, tayniay to kami.
Fofo, tayniay to kami.
Awaay ko fofo namo i loma', i omahan cingra, i loma' saho kamo a mitala to pinokayan ningra.
Awaay ko fofo namo i loma', i omahan cingra, i loma' saho kamo a mitala to pinokayan ningra.
S.TRANSL: 你們的爺爺不在家，他在田裡，你們在家等他回來吧。
Your grandfather is not at home. He’s in the field. Wait for him to come back.

S.FORM: Tayniay kiso faki!
Tayniay kiso faki!
Halafi:nay to caka sasi'araw, 'aka:wangay to kiso.
Halafi:nay to caka sasi'araw, 'aka:wangay to kiso.
S.TRANSL: I haven’t seen you in a while. You’ve grown taller.

S.FORM: Tadamalipahak a ma'araw ko katayni iso.
Tadamalipahak a ma'araw ko katayni iso.
S.TRANSL: It’s so good to see you.

S.FORM: O sapafeli i tomowanan koni a onglay, na'engen tayra i pinsiyang.
O sapafeli i tomowanan koni a onglay, na'engen tayra i pinsiyang.
S.TRANSL: 這是給你們的鳳梨，要放到冰箱裡。
Here’s a pineapple for you. Put it in the refrigerator.

S.FORM: Halafin cowa to katayni, tahidangen ako ko 'alomanay mapolong a mitaheka.
Halafin cowa to katayni, tahidangen ako ko 'alomanay mapolong a mitaheka.
S.TRANSL: 這麼久沒來，我叫大家一起來吃飯。
It’s been a while. Let’s have a meal together.

S.FORM: Hamaan to malifot, o ociya ko nga'ayay, tayni i palafangan malalicay ho kita.
Hamaan to malifot, o ociya ko nga'ayay, tayni i palafangan malalicay ho kita.
S.TRANSL: 不用麻煩了，我喝茶就好，我們來客廳聊天。
No need to bother. I’ll just have tea. Let’s sit in the living room and chat.

S.FORM: Ko'iday ko pipatala iso, maminokay to kako.
Ko'iday ko pipatala iso, maminokay to kako.
S.TRANSL: 謝謝你的招待，我要回去了。
Thank you for your hospitality. I have to go now.

S.FORM: Matokaday to kona koko', panokayen cedeng han ko kakomaen.
Matokaday to kona koko', panokayen cedeng han ko kakomaen.
S.TRANSL: 這隻雞剛殺好，你帶回去慢慢吃。
This chicken was just freshly killed. Take it home and enjoy it slowly.

S.FORM: Manga'ay masaso'araw ho kita to anocila a helek no lahok han?
Manga'ay masaso'araw ho kita to anocila a helek no lahok han?
S.TRANSL: 我和您約明天下午好嗎?
Can I make an appointment with you tomorrow afternoon?

S.FORM: Manga'ay to, icowa kita malalitemoh?
Manga'ay to, icowa kita malalitemoh?
Manga'ay i pitakcian kita haw? wa mamilu-ing kita.
Manga'ay i pitakcian kita haw? wa mamilo-ing kita.
S.TRANSL: 我們約學校好嗎?我們要錄影。
How about meeting at school? We need to shoot a video.

S.FORM: I sefi sa mamanay, wa mamica'edong to losid a tayra kako.
I sefi sa mamanay, wa mamica'edong to losid a tayra kako.
S.TRANSL: 那去聚會所好了，我會穿族服去。
Then let’s go to the community center. I’ll wear folk costume.

S.FORM: Maka:pah ko kafocerak no congiliw no sakola no niyaro' niyam, kafocerakan no congiliw tayni sato a mikilim i takowanan.
Maka:pah ko kafocerak no congiliw no sakola no niyaro' niyam, kafocerakan no congiliw tayni sato a mikilim i takowanan.
S.TRANSL: 我們部落的櫻花盛開很漂亮。等花開的時候你來找我吧!
The cherry blossoms in our tribe are beautiful when they bloom. Come find me when the flowers bloom!

S.FORM: Anohatira tahira ho i kacanglahan, halafin tato!
Anohatira tahira ho i kacanglahan, halafin tato!
S.TRANSL: 那要等到春天，太晚了吧!
That would have to wait until spring. It’s too late, isn’t it?

S.FORM: Mahaen i, pikiloma'an sato ko katayni iso.
Mahaen i, pikiloma'an sato ko katayni iso.
S.TRANSL: 那你豐年祭的時候來吧!
Then come during our Harvest Festival!

S.FORM: Hayda, hinatala han to ako.
Hayda, hinatala han to ako.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’m looking forward to it!

S.FORM: Milicay ho tisowanan, hano patatikol a malinah tayni i niyaro' kiso?
Milicay ho tisowanan, hano patatikol a malinah tayni i niyaro' kiso?
S.TRANSL: 請問你為甚麼要搬回部落生活?
May I ask why you decided to move back to the tribe?

S.FORM: Wa mamalasingsi ko kapinokay no mako.
Wa mamalasingsi ko kapinokay no mako.
S.TRANSL: I want to return to teach at the local school.

S.FORM: Hano caka i tokay a malasingsi?
Hano caka i tokay a malasingsi?
S.TRANSL: Why not teach in the city?

S.FORM: Samanen ma'ilol kako to niyaro' ako, nanay ira ko sapipacoay to riyaro'an.
Samanen ma'ilol kako to niyaro' ako, nanay ira ko sapipacoay to riyaro'an.
S.TRANSL: 因為我懷念我的故鄉，也希望能回饋部落。
Because I miss my hometown and I also want to give back to the tribe.

S.FORM: Tadamafana' kiso a mitenooy, o cima to ko pasifana'ay i kisowanan?
Tadamafana' kiso a mitenooy, o cima to ko pasifana'ay i kisowanan?
S.TRANSL: 你很會織布，是誰教你的?
You’re very skilled at weaving, who taught you?

S.FORM: Ci fofo ako, i niyaro' niyam cingra ko mafana'ay a mitenooy.
Ci fofo ako, i niyaro' niyam cingra ko mafana'ay a mitenooy.
S.TRANSL: 是我的奶奶，她是我們部落最會織布的人。
It was my grandmother, she is the most skilled weaver in our tribe.

S.FORM: Mana sapinanamaw kiso a mitenooy?
Mana sapinanamaw kiso a mitenooy?
S.TRANSL: How did you develop an interest in learning weaving?

S.FORM: O mitenooyay ko serangawan ita, mangalay midotoc to serangawan kako.
O mitenooyay ko serangawan ita, mangalay midotoc to serangawan kako.
S.TRANSL: 織布是我們的文化，我想要讓文化延續。
Weaving is a part of our culture, and I want to ensure its continuity.

S.FORM: Nga'ayay a kaenen koni a ^epah.
Nga'ayay a kaenen koni a ^epah.
O niyah a misa^epahan yo!
O niyah a misa^epahan yo!
Idahi:ay to kiso, halafinay ko pisa^epah haw?
Idahi:ay to kiso, halafinay ko pisa^epah haw?
S.TRANSL: 你真厲害，這要釀很久嗎?
You’re really talented. Does it take a long time to make?

S.FORM: Caka halafin, todong cecay a lipay nga'ayay to, i'ayaw rahkaden ho ko ko^tengay a malahakhak, nga, pacamolen to tamod samadahen a mitiyil, maedeng to paro han to i koreng.
Caka halafin, todong cecay a lipay nga'ayay to, i'ayaw rahkaden ho ko ko^tengay a malahakhak, nga, pacamolen to tamod samadahen a mitiyil, maedeng to paro han to i koreng.
S.TRANSL: 不用，大約一周就好了。把糯米先蒸熟，再加入酒麴一起拌勻，就可以裝到甕裡了。
No, it only takes about a week. After steaming the sticky rice and white rice, we mix it with yeast powder, and then it can be stored in a jar.

S.FORM: O maanmaan ko mipa'acaan iso?
O maanmaan ko mipa'acaan iso?
Ira ini ko kamamoday ato lokiyo, sahoto ono niyamay a mipalomaan!
Ira ini ko kamamoday ato lokiyo, sahoto ono niyamay a mipalomaan!
S.TRANSL: 我這裡有辣椒和蕗蕎，都是我自己種的喔!
I have chili and lokiy, both grown by myself!

S.FORM: Ano tosa han ko mi'acaan, wa pina ko 'aca?
Ano tosa han ko mi'acaan, wa pina ko 'aca?
Tosa so'ot ira ko lima polo' a lomo'odan
Tosa so'ot ira ko lima polo' a lomo'odan
Maolahay kako toni a riko', pina ko 'aca?
Maolahay kako toni a riko', pina ko 'aca?
S.TRANSL: 我喜歡這件衣服，多少錢?
I like this piece of clothing. How much is it?

S.FORM: Lima so'ot a lomo'od konini.
Lima so'ot a lomo'od konini.
'Atekakay tato, sakaemeden ko miming mamanay?
'Atekakay tato, sakaemeden ko miming mamanay?
S.TRANSL: It’s too expensive. Can’t you lower the price a bit?

S.FORM: cato:, ano lowanen mamasipon to kako.
cato:, ano lowanen mamasipon to kako.
S.TRANSL: No, if I lower it further, I’ll lose money.

S.FORM: Anohatira, ora kohetingay a riko' ko 'a'acaen ako.
Anohatira, ora kohetingay a riko' ko 'a'acaen ako.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!那我要一件黑色的衣服。
Alright then, I’ll take a black piece of clothing.

S.FORM: Oni a po'ot ato dangah ko 'acaen ako.
Oni a po'ot ato dangah ko 'acaen ako.
S.TRANSL: 我要這把刀和這個鍋子。
I want this knife and this pot.

S.FORM: Tosa ca'ol a limo'od, ono nakamayan no mako a misanga'an koni, malalid ko pitatatiw cowa ho kapiciw.
Tosa ca'ol a limo'od, ono nakamayan no mako a misanga'an koni, malalid ko pitatatiw cowa ho kapiciw.
S.TRANSL: 總共2000元，這是我自己手工打造的，保證可以用很久。
It’s a total of 2000 dollars. I handmade these, and they are guaranteed to last a long time.

S.FORM: Siwkayen ako ko widang tayni a mi'aca, manga'ay ka^meden to miming haw?
Siwkayen ako ko widang tayni a mi'aca, manga'ay ka^meden to miming haw?
S.TRANSL: 我介紹朋友來買，可以再便宜一些嗎?
I’ll introduce my friend to buy. Can you give a further discount?

S.FORM: Hayda! Sakaemeden to tosa polo' a pasento ko hamiso.
Hayda! Sakaemeden to tosa polo' a pasento ko hamiso.
S.TRANSL: Alright! I’ll give you a 20% discount.

S.FORM: Atiati: katayni a minengneng, ira ko riko' ato talopong itini.
Atiati: katayni a minengneng, ira ko riko' ato talopong itini.
S.TRANSL: 來看看喔!衣服帽子都有賣。
Come and take a look! We sell clothes and hats.

S.FORM: Licay ho, pina ko 'aca tona riko'?
Licay ho, pina ko 'aca tona riko'?
Tolo so'ot lima polo' a limo'od ko cecay a rikoan, hatolo han ko pi'aca i, cecay ca'ol a limo'odan.
Tolo so'ot lima polo' a limo'od ko cecay a rikoan, hatolo han ko pi'aca i, cecay ca'ol a limo'odan.
S.TRANSL: One piece of clothing is 350 dollars, three pieces for 1000 dollars.

S.FORM: Cecay aca ko 'a'acaen ako, pafelien kako to fa^lohay.
Cecay aca ko 'a'acaen ako, pafelien kako to fa^lohay.
S.TRANSL: 我買一件就好，請給我新的。
I’ll just buy one piece, please give me a new one.

S.FORM: Nga'ay ho, wa mami'aca kako to hakhak ato 'imocay a lu-lo.
Nga'ay ho, wa mami'aca kako to hakhak ato 'imocay a lo-lo.
S.TRANSL: 你好，我想要買糯米飯和山胡椒滷肉。
Hello, I would like to buy sticky rice and braised pork with maqaw pepper.

S.FORM: Mapaliwalay to ko hakhak. ira ho ko tana'ay a tinpong, mangalay kiso a mi'aca?
Mapaliwalay to ko hakhak. ira ho ko tana'ay a tinpong, mangalay kiso a mi'aca?
S.TRANSL: 飯賣完了。我還有刺蔥油餅，你要買嗎?
The rice is sold out. I have tana pancakes, would you like to buy them?

S.FORM: Hayda, pafeli han kako to cecay, cila to 'aca sato kako to hakhak.
Hayda, pafeli han kako to cecay, cila to 'aca sato kako to hakhak.
S.TRANSL: 好吧!請給我一份，我下次再來買飯。
Alright, please give me one. I’ll come back next time to buy rice.

S.FORM: Hay, patadoen ako kiso a mipalo i kalasan, lima polo' a limo'od konini.
Hay, patadoen ako kiso a mipalo i kalasan, lima polo' a limo'od konini.
S.TRANSL: W：好，我幫你用袋子裝起來，這樣50元。
Okay, I’ll pack it in a bag for you. That’ll be 50 dollars.
